content: The little old man wanted to pull Pinocchio's ears. Think how he felt when, upon searching for them, he discovered that he had forgotten to make them!
translations: ita:Il piccolo vecchietto volle tirare le orecchie di Pinocchio. Pensate a come si sent√¨ quando, alla ricerca di esse, scopr
